resume: I'm Lucas Pedrosa, 20 year old, Brazilian, and I study at the Federal University of Sergipe. I enjoy a fun work environment, as long as everyone is respected, and I'm addicted to challenges believe this motivates me to go further.

descriptions.first: I worked developing websites using WordPress.
descriptions.second: There I developed soft skills such as being proactive and knowledge trade with coworkers.

descriptions.first: I develop websites with Liquid Template, a Shopify's Framework, and do customer support.
descriptions.second: I have increased my communication skills by doing support in English and Portuguese.
